readable.title: 1334892555_1beff092c3
readable.content: The girls are playing with foam swords . Two girls sparring with a red and blue bat while another girl watches . Two kids with helmets playing with Nerf swords while one looks on drinking from a plastic cup . Two young girls playing with rubber swords in a park while a chaperone watches . Two young girls with sponge bats being to play while an older girl is acting as the referee .
